ing: 1 fluid ounce Gran Gala Triple Orange Liqueur
des: "Fresh cilantro, lime juice, and an orange garnish make this Gran Gala and tequila cooler a perfect warm-weather cocktail."
ins:
Muddle lime juice with 1.5 tbsp. fresh cilantro
Add Blanco Tequila & Gran Gala Orange Liqueur. Stir with ice and strain into an ice filled glass. Top with Pellegrino.
Garnish with orange.
